input.sentences: here we are at the emmy awards ! what an exciting time it is !
the trophies are all lined up on the table | ready to go to their new homes with the award winners .
the shadow of the award is quite impressive .
a winner receives his award for a job well done .
everyone is happy that they were able to attend this wonderful event !
output.sentences: The emmy awards were super exciting.
The table was nicely set up with all the trophies and winners.
There was a shadow of an award on the center stage and it was impressive.
The winners that did a great job, received their trophies.
Over all this was a wonderful and happy event.
